tool_description: The WebKnox entities API gives you access to millions of entities such as cities, actors, movies, cars, etc. You can search for entities and get factual information. Additionally, you may detect known entities from texts (often referred to as Named Entity Recognition).
name: Entities
title: Entities

api_list.name: Find Quotes
api_list.description: Find quotes from people about certain topics.

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: The author of the quote or empty if the author does not matter.

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description: The text that must appear in the quote. Leave that empty if you want all quotes from the given author.

api_list.name: Detect Entities
api_list.description: Detect entity mentions in a given text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text in which entities should be detected.
